title: Invisible cursor fix
body:
Hi guys, I just played a game in which I had no cursor in-game (only in-game)- I'm aware after a brief scan of the interwebs that a few people have been experiencing this. I haven't played league for about 5 months, in which time I've switched to windows 10. Running the game in compatibility mode for windows 8 fixed the bug for me.

**Run the game in whichever windows you last used before switching to 10.**
